product_name: MACStudio Fix Pro Set + Blur Weightless Loose Setting Powder
summary: SummaryMAC Studio Fix Pro Set + Blur Weightless Loose Powder is an ultra-refined loose powder that sets makeup all day, instantly absorbs oil and provides a photo-friendly matte finish with a 3D blurring effect. Includes a plush puff applicator for luxurious application.
details: DetailsBenefitsLightweight, ultra-refined powder sets makeupInstantly absorbs oil and controls shineBlurs and smooths the look of blemishesColor-true longwearDoesn't settle, cake or creaseSweat & humidity-resistantDoes not cause acneSuitable for all skin typesFeaturesLightweight setting powderDimensional matte finishSheer coverageBreathable, Pro-inspired setting powderKey IngredientsDual Light-Bending Technology: uses high-refractive index powders to refract light along with lecithin-coated powders to reflect light on skin for a 3D, blurring effectUltra-clear powder particles: help the powder stay color-true all day without looking dullItem 2609367How To UseApply loose setting powder with the included puff applicator or a brush all over the face as desired.IngredientsPolymethylsilsesquioxane, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Dimethicone, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Diisostearyl Malate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Tocopherol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, [+/- Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Chromium Oxide Greens (CI 77288), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Red 30 (CI 73360), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985)].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply loose setting powder with the included puff applicator or a brush all over the face as desired.

reviews.headline: Stay cute
reviews.comments: I really like how the power is released from the compact because it helps me to not put on too much.

reviews.headline: Less powder, for same price, ugh!
reviews.comments: I absolutley love this powder, but alas, I have grown tired of the much smaller amount in the package for the same price.  The smaller quantity of powder has caused me to switch to another loose powder for the same price and almost twice the amount of powder.

reviews.headline: "CREASELESS"
reviews.comments: I repeat, CREASELESS. Enough said.

reviews.headline: Blew Me Away!
reviews.comments: I bought this from a mac counter today in the shade light. I did my makeup per usual and decided to set my entire face with this powder and I am speechless at how blurred and velvety matte i feel. It minimizes the appearance of my undereye finelines and smile lines. The biggest test for me besides wear of course was how my bronzer and blush application wore and they worked amazingly. I am a very oily skinned woman and found that this powder stepped up the game against my holy grail powder: Huda Beauty in shade cupcake. I am thinking to combine these two powders for the ultimate all day/night wear. Mac, you did great on this product and please never discontinue this powder.

reviews.headline: Here we go again Macâ€¦yall are killing me!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this powder in shade medium and have been setting with it since it was released. Picked up a new one and its not the same shade. Not even close.

reviews.headline: Not natural
reviews.comments: Im giving this a 3 because it does blur. But the overall whitish cast to my skin was a no go. I have tried 3x to wear it. Im returning.

reviews.headline: Excellent!
reviews.comments: Best setting powder ever!  It sets well and does not cause lines or get in creases!  One of the best products I have ever bought!

reviews.headline: Love the finished look.
reviews.comments: I love the lightness of the powder and how smooth it makes my face appear.

reviews.headline: Perfectly match
reviews.comments: I was looking for a more finished look. The Max Studio Fix Pro Set-Blur loose powder enhance my total look. I have gotten many compliments on my makeup on how natural it looks. It's the perfect touch and the blend is perfect. This product sets the tone!

reviews.headline: Perfect feel
reviews.comments: Love the light weight and feels so smooth. Blends in with my skin tone perfect. Doesn't make me break out and my face doesn't get oily.

reviews.headline: Where have I been???
reviews.comments: I'm not sure if they made a new formula of the transparent color, but I am IN LOVE!!! Very weightless and sets seamlessly

reviews.headline: Loved,loved this item.It was exactly what I was looking for
reviews.comments: The powder had great coverage for my skin, yet was light and didn't smug over my other skin care products.

reviews.headline: Like but didn't LOVE
reviews.comments: I am have oily skin. So for me, I always look for that absorption power in setting powder. I normally use one size and Huda. I wanted to try another one, because Mac is tried and true. It didnt absorb oil as much as I would like. Within a couple hours I was oily. I will try it again with my Lancome foundation and see if it fairs better.

reviews.headline: Flashback
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this product. It goes on smooth and silky, does not feel heavy or cakey. However, the flashback is terrible, looks very chalky in photos with flash.

reviews.headline: I would buy again.
reviews.comments: Created very smooth looking skin.

reviews.headline: Its OK
reviews.comments: It's OK, very light, but it's still settles in my wrinkles and is a little "cakey" on my under eye concealer.

reviews.headline: Flashback Mary vibes
reviews.comments: I thought i loved this until i took a pic with flash and u could see all the powder. Scary.

reviews.headline: Amazing powder (the best)
reviews.comments: Tried many high end and drugstore powders and this is my favorite. It controlled the oils on my T-zone almost all day. With other powders i have to reaply more than once throughout the day. My only dislike is the packaging.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Love it

reviews.headline: Wont repurchase
reviews.comments: A "touch-up" powder for oily skin at best. I wouldn't use this soley as my setting powder. The powder net packaging is barely functional so be prepared to take the top off.

media.headline: First Impressions on Mac Studio Powder
media.caption: Mac Studio powder review

faceoff_positive.comments: As a dark skin woman, I absolutely loved this powder. I felt the color match was accurate for me. I felt that the design was absolutely beautiful. I loved that it came with the powder puffer, and that it had the powder shield, however, a con for me was that the shield, when using the puffer only dispense a small amount of powder, so that takes up some time of having to push on the shield multiple times however I felt that when using a brush, I got more powder out and was able to get an application done quicker. I feel that when I use this powder in comparison to some of my other powders i.e. Morphe this has a better experience. I do like how the Mac powder was not as shiny or has like a glitter/ highlighting undertone like the Morphe powder so it didn't provide as much shine to my face when using the powder with my particular brand of bronzer and blush however, it's just about personal preference and that's what worked for me. I loved how the shield was there, so although I have the shield as a con is more of a con in terms of using the powder puffer I absolutely love this design because I can open up this product and know that I am not going to have my powder goes spilling everywhere which is a 10 out of 10 especially when traveling. I loved how it has a puffer that can go in the powder case and that whole design aspect of it because I can take that and go and it's going to fit in in some of my smaller bags and with my lipgloss cards financial cards in my phone in my cards my keys. I'm good to go and I don't have to worry about not having something to reapply my make up with or touch up my make up absolutely love that design, even though it takes a little bit longer to apply I like that it's all compacted in one thing versus having multiple tools to apply the application a 10 out of 10 product I definitely will recommend definitely an amazing purchase!
faceoff_positive.headline: Absolutely purchase!

faceoff_negative.comments: I've tried a lot of different setting powders and this is the first I've found that makes my base look significantly worse! I've been doing makeup for 9 years so it's not an application issue, trust me. The texture is quite light and doesn't feel cakey but it wears horribly longer than around 3 hours. I have oily combo skin and find at the end of the day the makeup on my entire T zone is completely separated and looks awful. I'm about an NC5 for foundation and MAC doesn't make a concealer light enough/with the right undertone for me so I use a mix of Too Faced in Cloud and Dior Forever Skin in 00 Neutral for a bright undereye. Every time I've applied the 'white' translucent powder, no matter what method I use, my undereye concealer immediately turns orange and about 2-4 shades darker. It doesn't affect my foundation the same but I notice it actually removes some of the coverage, something I've never seen a translucent powder do. IMO this powder won't work for anyone who can identify with the statement: "most brands don't make complexion products light enough for me". It will leave you sad and a little orange with weirdly dark undereyes. I wanted to love this so much but this is the second MAC complexion product that's really disappointed me, really wish their lightest products were light enough for us pasty babes lol.
faceoff_negative.headline: Pale girlies BEWARE
